TopicTitle: How to plan and execute a mission to Duna

Articles.Content:
Hi all! I made a tutorial video covering how to plan a mission to Duna and then how to build and execute the mission. It's quite detailed, but only 15 minutes long. I hope people find it useful!

Also on my channel are a lot of short video showing off Kerbal mods. They should be very helpful to people new to using mods in KSP.

Edited March 1, 2015 by TinyPirate
